query: INSERT INTO recharges (customerId, amount, paymentMethod, status, transactionId, completedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) SELECT customerId, amount, 'pix', 'completed', txid, paidAt, createdAt, NOW() FROM pix_transactions WHERE customerId = 180002 AND status = 'paid' AND paidAt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY createdAt ASC
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.4046de8efa3e --database SoKyCCsEmaEjcFkVqbEFR7 --execute INSERT INTO recharges (customerId, amount, paymentMethod, status, transactionId, completedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) SELECT customerId, amount, 'pix', 'completed', txid, paidAt, createdAt, NOW() FROM pix_transactions WHERE customerId = 180002 AND status = 'paid' AND paidAt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY createdAt ASC
